On this week’s episode of the Healthyish podcast, Alexis joins Amanda in the Zoom studio to talk about her lifelong love affair with wild edible plants, the racial history of trespassing laws, and what you can cook with the weeds in your very own backyard.ContentThis content can also be viewed on the site it originates from.Stuff we talk about in this episodeHealthyish interview with Alexis NikoleAlexis Nikole’s juneberry hand pie recipeAlexis Nikole’s video about being a Black foragerAlexis Nikole’s Ramp RapHow to ListenListen to this episode through the audio player on this page, or subscribe via Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you get your podcasts to get all six episodes.
